::Zardus::

Zardus listens to the buzzing for a few more seconds, the memory of 
what this ship finally surfacing. The ship was a Predacon 
transport/fighter ship. It had been sent on a mission to destroy any 
Maximal pods orbiting earth, but the idiot pilot had crashed it into 
an astroid due to its limited scanning abilities.

"That," Zardus says, aiming his wrist at the vines and firing his 
draining missiles. The missiles release their draining field, big 
enough to reach whatever was within the vines. "Is Mosquitor," Zardus 
finishes, the vines stopping to move and the buzzing ceasing. He 
walks forward, taking out his sword and beginning to cut the vines 
away.

"Don't worry, he's harmless," he says to Wheeljack and Hurricane.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Alloran2@a... wrote:
> :::Wheeljack/Hurricane:::
> 
> Wheeljack: What is this?
> ::He takes out his gun.  Hurricane's horns are charging up::
